knimeNode.name: SSH Connection (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Configures the connection information used to connect to a remote host.

fullDescription.intro:
This legacy file handling node has been replaced by the SSH Connector and will become deprecated in the foreseeable future. For further information about the new file handling framework see the File Handling Guide.
This node configures the connection information that will be used to connect to a remote host.
fullDescription.option:
Method of authentication.
Password
Use username and password to authenticate.
Keyfile
Use keyfile to authenticate.
Use workflow credentials to determine user and password.
Password of the user or to the keyfile, if authentication via keyfile is selected.
Location of the keyfile. Note that the key file has to be in OpenSSH key file format.
Only connect if this host is part of the set known hosts file.
Specify the timeout for the connection in milliseconds here.
Open dialog that test the current connection.

ports.outPort: Port object containing the connection information.
